text:
@realDonaldTrump @marklevinshow @FoxNews If Obama's handling of H1N1 with 18,036 deaths upset you, then Trump's handling of Covid-19 with 85k+ deaths should make you livid! 😡

No? You're a fucking hypocrite! 🖕🖕
